parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({model:'llama-3.1-8b-instant',messages:[{role:'system',content:'Classify this email reply. Return JSON only.

Categories:
- "interested": wants to talk, call, meet, said yes, positive response
- "more_info": asked about pricing, services, how it works
- "not_interested": said no, not a fit, wrong person, decline
- "out_of_office": auto-reply, vacation, OOO
- "unsubscribe": remove me, stop emailing, spam complaint

Return: {"category": "...", "confidence": 0.0-1.0}'},{role:'user',content:'Reply text: ' + ($('Reply Webhook').item.json.body.reply_text || $('Reply Webhook').item.json.body.text || $('Reply Webhook').item.json.body.message || 'No text')}],temperature:0.1,max_tokens:100}) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ typecast: true, fields: { 'Status': $json.airtableStatus, 'Reply Category': $json.replyCategory, 'Notes': 'Reply classified as ' + $json.category + ' (confidence: ' + $json.confidence + ') on ' + new Date().toISOString() } }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({model:'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',messages:[{role:'system',content:'Draft a brief, helpful reply to this prospect who responded to our AI automation outreach. Keep it under 50 words, professional, warm. If they are interested, suggest a 15-min call. If they want more info, briefly explain our AI automation services. Return JSON: {"draft_reply": "..."}'},{role:'user',content:'Category: ' + $json.category + '\nOriginal reply: ' + ($('Reply Webhook').first().json.body.reply_text || $('Reply Webhook').first().json.body.text || 'No text')}],temperature:0.7,max_tokens:200}) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ status: 'processed', category: $('Parse Category').first().json.category, confidence: $('Parse Category').first().json.confidence, record_updated: $('Parse Category').first().json.recordId ? true : false, draft_reply: $json.choices ? JSON.parse($json.choices[0].message.content.replace(/```json?\n?/g, '').replace(/```/g, '').trim()).draft_reply : null }) }}
